languages.text: {n}Горько улыбнувшись, Соломон отвечает:{/n} "В это бывает сложно поверить, понимаю. Но я и впрямь обычный человек".
{n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."
languages.original_text: {n}Горько улыбнувшись, Соломон отвечает:{/n} "В это бывает сложно поверить, понимаю. Но я и впрямь обычный человек".

traits.locale_text: {n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."
{n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."

{n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."

languages.text: {n}苦笑しながら、彼は答えた。{/n}「信じがたいかもしれませんが、私はごく普通の人間です」
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."

traits.locale_text: {n}苦笑しながら、彼は答えた。{/n}「信じがたいかもしれませんが、私はごく普通の人間です」

languages.text: {n}Er antwortet mit trockenem Lächeln:{/n} "Es mag schwer zu glauben sein, aber ich bin eine völlig normale Person."
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er antwortet mit trockenem Lächeln:{/n} "Es mag schwer zu glauben sein, aber ich bin eine völlig normale Person."

languages.text: {n}Il esquisse un sourire canaille et rétorque :{/n} « Je sais que c'est difficile à croire, mais je suis un homme tout ce qu'il y a de plus ordinaire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il esquisse un sourire canaille et rétorque :{/n} « Je sais que c'est difficile à croire, mais je suis un homme tout ce qu'il y a de plus ordinaire. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne esboza una sonrisa sarcástica.{/n} «Aunque parezca mentira, soy una persona de lo más normal».
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne esboza una sonrisa sarcástica.{/n} «Aunque parezca mentira, soy una persona de lo más normal».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙苦笑着开了口。{/n}“虽然你未必相信，但我一直都是个非常正常的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙苦笑着开了口。{/n}“虽然你未必相信，但我一直都是个非常正常的人。”

languages.text: {n}Alaycı bir tebessümle cevap veriyor.{/n} "İnanması zor ama... Normal bir insanım da ondan."
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alaycı bir tebessümle cevap verir.{/n} "İnanması zor ama normal bir insanım da ondan."

languages.original_text: {n}Smiling wryly, he replies,{/n} "Hard as it is to believe, I am very much a normal person."
